title: Red Receives a Mysterious Invitation
summary: Little Red Riding Hood’s mother hands her a basket and a letter, instructing her to deliver both to her grandmother. Red discovers the letter is unsigned but romantic, and debates whether to open it. She decides to read the letter, learning it’s an anonymous confession of love for her grandmother, and resolves to discover the sender.

title: The Encounter with the Charming Stranger
summary: Red sets off through the woods and is intercepted by a mysterious, charming stranger—Wolf—who questions her about her mission. Wolf flirts with Red and tries to persuade her to take the longer scenic path. Red, intrigued but cautious, chooses the shortcut to reach her grandmother faster, suspecting Wolf may be the letter’s author.

title: Wolf Arrives First and Makes His Move
summary: Wolf takes the longer path but uses his cunning to arrive at Grandmother’s house before Red. He woos Grandmother with flowers and poetry, revealing himself as the secret admirer and seeking her affection. Grandmother, flattered yet skeptical, demands proof of his intentions, setting conditions for Wolf to fulfill before she considers his proposal.

title: Red Uncovers the Truth
summary: Red arrives and finds Wolf entertaining Grandmother. She confronts Wolf, exposing his identity as the letter’s author. Wolf confesses his feelings for Grandmother, but Red accuses him of manipulation. Grandmother, witnessing the confrontation, insists both explain their motives and make their cases openly.

title: A Choice of the Heart
summary: Grandmother questions both Red and Wolf about their intentions, prompting Red to admit her fear of losing her grandmother and Wolf to declare his genuine love. Grandmother decides to test Wolf’s sincerity by asking him to prove his commitment through a selfless act. Wolf agrees, and Red must decide whether to trust him or protect her grandmother from potential heartbreak.

title: The Act of Devotion
summary: Wolf embarks on a difficult errand to retrieve Grandmother’s cherished locket from a distant village, demonstrating his devotion. Red secretly follows to ensure he doesn’t scheme or deceive. Along the way, Red and Wolf face obstacles together, leading to an unexpected bond forming between them.

title: Return and Revelations
summary: Wolf and Red return with the locket and recount their journey to Grandmother, who recognizes the sincerity in both. Wolf declares his intentions once more, this time showing respect for Red’s bond with her grandmother. Grandmother chooses to allow Wolf into their lives, and Red reveals her own growing feelings for Wolf, complicating the romantic dynamics.

title: A New Beginning
summary: Grandmother proposes they all try to coexist, suggesting a dinner to celebrate. During the meal, Wolf confesses he has fallen for Red, not Grandmother, realizing his affection shifted during their journey. Red must decide whether to accept Wolf’s feelings or reject him out of loyalty to her grandmother, leading to a heartfelt conversation and the promise of a new romance.
